Name: stxoid
Description: extended statistics object containing the definition for this data

Name: stxdinherit
Description: if true, the stats include values from child tables, not just the values in the specified relation

Name: stxdndistinct
Description: n-distinct counts, serialized as pg_ndistinct type

Name: stxddependencies
Description: functional dependency statistics, serialized as pg_dependencies type

Name: stxdmcv
Description: mcv (most-common values) list statistics, serialized as pg_mcv_list type

Name: stxdexpr
Description: per-expression statistics, serialized as an array of pg_statistic type
